data.title: [entity] "Attach to sun" function no longer available in the light entity
data.body: I can no longer assign a light to the sun in order to create a sun flare. The "attach to sun" function is missing.

data.title: cant find CESharpProjectType.vsix
data.body:
Hi,

I can't seem to find the CESharp visual studio extention in the tools folder. If i look at the documentation for running c# in visual studio they say u can find CESharpProjectType.vsix in <root>\Tools\CESharpVSExtension\. 
When i look in the cryengine launcher, in settings the engine directory says: "G:\CRYENGINE Launcher\Crytek". which i suppose is the root directory, so i go to that directory and i see the engine versions i have installed but if i go in there, i see the tools in there i dont see the CESharpVSExtension.

Is this just me being a derp and not looking in the right folder or is my instance of the launcher bugged and do i have to reinstall

//Note: i installed cryengine 5.2 and 5.3 and in both tools folders there wasnt an CESharpVSExtension folder

data.title: "cry_waf.exe" app doesn't create the "CRYENGINE.sln" to compile the engine entire
data.body:
I've already downloaded the CRYENGINE's source code from Github to explore the main source and to can compile it later. But after extracting the full CE_5.3's SDK, the "cry_waf.exe" app doesn't create the "CRYENGINE.sln" because it shows me the following warnings:

![ce5 3_ cry_waf exe issues](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7037699/21292924/600c350a-c515-11e6-8f2c-282164e18a45.jpg)

It seems that issues are focused on the following  ".py" src files:

- ### Runner.py (line 316):
`								st = tsk.runnable_status()	# No file filter, execute all tasks
`

- ###  generate_uber_files.py (line 95):
`	if super(gen_uber_file, self).runnable_status() == -1:`


- ### Task.py (line 484):
`	up(x.abspath().encode())`

- ### Task.py (line 579):
`key = self.uid()`


Greetings.

data.title: Flowgraf: Child of Prefab is not saved
data.body:
If you "Open" a prefab you can select one child element and use "Add Selected Entity" to add it to a flowgraph.
It works perfectly and is shown as [Prefabgroup.prefabname]entityname. But it will not be saved. After reloading the level it is gone.

data.title: Graphics quality don't change
data.body: sys_spec don't change in anyway, its stuck at Very High (4).

data.title: Cannot "Generate metadata" for 5.3
data.body: I Cannot "Generate metadata" for 5.3 projects - when press SHIFT and RMB on cryproject it just dont have such menu.

data.title: Ledges Dont Work - 5.3
data.body: Ledge objects not working in new 5.3 version - checked with gamesdk on woodland and airfield maps (and on new levels). Please fix them in new 5.3.1 release!

data.title: !B (Tools) Wwise SDK installation expects new directory structure.
data.body:
Latest python script is not working anymore, usually people has installed cryengine under "Program files(x86)" which contains spaces. Also the old structure under SDKs\Audio\wwise is not the same that wwise project in visual studio solution is using. This patch copies the Wwise SDK folder to the expected SDKs\Audio\wwise folder and allow compile Wwise.

A README.txt file has been added with info and tips on how to use it.

data.title: !B (System) Wrong warning missing thread configuration when only common configuration is defined.
data.body: If only common configuration is defined in the thread configuration file, the sytem was loading it and then trying to load some CPU dependant configuration. If not found, it was showing a warning about platform not being defined. Common configuration was loaded but ignored when checking the loaded condition.

data.title: Missing CryScaleformHelper.dll precompiled for release
data.body:
In this 5.3 I'm missing the `win_ x64_release` and `win_x86_release` folders containing precompiled CryScaleformHelper.dll for release builds. I tried the CryScaleformHelper.dll under bin\win_x64 folder and it works with engine compiled in profile mode. It's not working with engine compiled in release mode. Tried with engine compiled with waf. Engine compiled via cmake works in profile also. I have some issues to compile in release mode with cmake so I didn't test on cmake - release yet.

Should it works the same dll for both or are we missing the proper dlls?

data.title: Missing Pure Function in ISimpleExtension.h
data.body:
Following pure function is missing in blank project's **ISimpleExtension.h**
```c++
virtual const void* GetRMIBase() const override { return nullptr; }
```

data.title: Limit editor framerate
data.body:
Fixed #44  "'Vsync', 'sys_Maxfps' Console command doesnt work."

Now you can limit framerate inside sandbox by using r_Vsync and sys_MaxFPS.

To make fps limit applied for future sandbox session, open "editor.cfg", add follwing two lines:
```
r_vSync = 0
sys_MaxFPS = 30
```

So this has probably being asked for a number of times now?
I didn't see a open issue for it so I shall open this one.

data.title: Material editor crashes CryEngine randomly
data.body: Opening the material editor and performing actions causes the entire CryEngine to freeze and then crash.  There is no particular action in the material editor that causes the crash, It just crashes randomly.

data.title: Register Flow Node LNK2001 Error
data.body:
- Update Project from 5.2 to 5.3. Changed Header Include to "#include <CryFlowGraph/IFlowBaseNode.h>".

- LNK2001 Error occur, preventing the Engine to build correctly.

https://puu.sh/sRsz3/0c3a9173e4.png

**Files causing the Issue:**
CustomFlowNodes.h: http://pastebin.com/ifnzdnYe
CustomFlowNodes.cpp: http://pastebin.com/f0nkwCiC

**What I have done to try to fix it:**

- Completely Rebuild Project

- Update CMakeList.txt to prevent having old 5.2 Flownode files

data.title: CMake engine compilation
data.body:
* ~~Trying to compile the engine (release branch 5.3 tag) via cmake on debug or profile (it is _LIB defined) try to compile line 1833 in [FrameProfileRender.cpp](https://github.com/CRYTEK-CRYENGINE/CRYENGINE/blob/release/Code/CryEngine/CrySystem/FrameProfileRender.cpp#L1833) fails because this function accepts only one parameter. The project that fails is CrySystem.~~

* ~~If I solve this one, trying to compile the launcher .exe gives me one unresolved external in CryAction: `struct SRegFactoryNode * g_pHeadToRegFactories`~~

* If I try to compile on release mode, I have another different issue, one warning and one error, external symbol not defined from CryAction:
`2>CryAction.lib(CryAction_main_uber_1.obj) : warning LNK4217: locally defined symbol CreateSystemInterface imported in function "public: virtual bool __cdecl CCryAction::StartEngine(struct SSystemInitParams &)" (?StartEngine@CCryAction@@UEAA_NAEAUSSystemInitParams@@@Z)`
`2>CryAction.lib(CryAction_main_uber_1.obj) : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol CreateGameStartup referenced in function "private: bool __cdecl CCryAction::InitGame(struct SSystemInitParams &)" (?InitGame@CCryAction@@AEAA_NAEAUSSystemInitParams@@@Z)`
